```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(here)
library(bib2df)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

```


## Read data
```{r}
df <- bib2df(here::here("data/zotero_oct25.bib")) %>% 
  clean_names()

csv <- read_csv(here::here("data/zotero_oct25.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()


masters <- read_csv(here::here("data/palmyra_master.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```


```{r}

authors <- c(paste0("author_", 1:20))

zotero <- csv %>% 
  select(item_type, publication_year, title, author, journal = publication_title, doi, url, manual_tags, abstract = abstract_note) %>% 
  mutate(zotero_id = 1:n()) %>% 
  separate(author, authors, sep = ";")

```

```{r}
combine_table <- masters %>% 
  left_join(zotero, by = "title")
```

## authors list

```{r}
count_per_author <- zotero %>% 
  group_by(author_1) %>% 
  tally()


```
